message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're highlighting, I'm looking to spend closer to $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?
